name: Invade
description:
Invade is a multiplayer real-time strategy game built in a week.

Your goal is to capture as much of the solar system as possible before the time runs out (5 mins) or your opponent eradicates you. A new solar system is created every time you play, so each game is unique.

Wait until planets are nearby enough, then you can send some of your population to colonize the new planet.

Solo mode gives you a chance to explore the controls, Battle is where the real fun begins. Connect with other players and race them to invade the solar system.

Controls:

  • Mouse to move and select planets. 
  • Press Space to send population to another planet (when it's in range)

Let me know what you love and hate about Invade in the comments below.
